[Page Title: Private Events | Share House in Charleston, SC]

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Private Events

Book an Event

Looking for the perfect venue to host your next private event? Look no further! We offer an exquisite setting for all your special occasions. Whether you're planning a corporate gathering, a milestone celebration, or an intimate social event, our versatile spaces and exceptional service will make your event unforgettable.

For all inquiries, please fill out the form below, and we’ll be in touch soon.

[Page Title: Share House | Shore-Inspired Restaurant + Bar in Charleston, SC]

Home
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating hero video paused, press to play video Playing hero video, press to pause video 
Welcome to Share House

Brought to you by Uptown Hospitality Group, Share House is a shore-inspired restaurant + bar located just off of lively King Street. Known for our legendary orange crushes, craveable food, and laid-back vibes, Share House is your ideal spot for daytime hangs, long lunches or late-night gatherings.

What’s Cooking

Shareable snacks, our legendary Bird Bucket featuring our house made crispy chicken tenders, inventive sandwiches, and our signature crush cocktails, all bringing a taste of nostalgia. Click below to see for yourself.
View Menus 
Ready to Party?

Whether you’re planning a birthday, milestone celebration, or casual get-together, Share House offers versatile spaces, great food and drinks, and a lively setting just off King Street. Submit an event inquiry today to start planning.
Inquire Now 
Gift Cards & Merch

Treat someone to a night of great food and drinks — or grab some merch.
Share the Love 
Entertainment

The absolute best live music, DJs, and events off King Street. Check out the lineup below.
View Line Up 
Follow along
@sharehousechs Reservations Email Signup

Daily Happy Hour

Live Band Karaoke every Thursday

Make it a sundae!

A 20% gratuity will be added to all parties of 6 or more. *Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness.

Drinks

Crushes

Orange Crush

Smirnoff Orange Vodka, triple sec, soda, fresh squeezed orange juice on top

Key Lime Crush

Sminoff Vanilla Vodka, triple sec, simple syrup, fresh squeeze lime juice, whipped cream, graham cracker crumbs

Paloma Crush

Don Julio Blanco, triple sec, lime juice, fresh squeezed grapefruit on top

Watermelon Crush

Smirnoff Watermelon, triple sec, lemon lime soda, fresh watermelon juice

Cocktails

Strawberry Basil Smash

Titos Handmade Vodka, strawberry infused St. Germain, strawberry purée, basil, agave, fresh lemon juice, topped with soda

Orange Mojito

Tanqueray Gin, orange simple syrup, mint, fresh lime juice, topped with soda

Habañero Margarita

Habañero steeped Lunazul Blanco, Chinola, agave, fresh lime

Pineapple Mezcalita

Union Mezcal, Cointreau, agave, fresh lime, pineapple juice

Serves 4

Large Format

Citrus Bowl
40 $ 
Zest Lime, Zest Lemon, ginger beer, fresh lime, Jarritos grapefruit soda

Ann Street Staples

Bodega Bloody

Ketel One Vodka, Charleston Mix Bold and Spicy, pickle juice, bacon, Old Bay rum

Bodega Espresso Martini

Ketel One Vodka, Counter Culture Brew, Black River Coffee Liqueur, chocolate bitters, cocoa powder

Drafts

PACIFICO | Pacifico Brewery, Mazatlán, México 4.5%

Crisp and clean Mexican pilsner

Tropicália | Creature Comforts Brewing Co., Athens, GA 6.6%

Ripe and juicy IPA

Holy City Pilsner | Holy City Brewery, Charleston, SC 5%

Smooth drinking pilsner from the Lowcountry

PARK Circle Pale | Commonhouse Aleworks, North Charleston, SC 5.5%

Year round, hop-forward pale

Perni-haze | Wicked Weed Brewing, Asheville, NC 6.9%

Hazy IPA with effortless finish

TROP HOP | Kings Calling Brewery, Charleston, SC 6.1%

Tropical infused IPA from “the guy” on “that show”

Sour mash

Revelry Never Sunny | Charleston, SC 7%

Sycamore IPA | Asheville, NC 7.5%
